definitions.title: n. pr. m.
definitions.body: (GFM:Ju 4:2; PAOS xix (1898), 160 cp. Hittite names in -sira);—

general of Jabin, king of Hazor Ju Jdg 4:2 + 12 t. Ju Jdg 4; appar. himself king Jdg 5:20, Jdg 5:26, Jdg 5:28, Jdg 5:30; cf. 1Sa 12:9, Ps 83:10; —on ´[[ס]] v. GFM:Ju, 107 ff.; PAOS l. c.; LXX S(e)isara. †
[[בְּנֵי־סִיסְרָא]] returned exiles, Ezr 2:53 = Ne 7:55; LXX Seisaraq, Sisara, etc.
